Historical charm and harbor idyll in the heart of Copenhagen
In the iconic â€œBlue Warehouseâ€, one of Copenhagenâ€™s most sought-after and historic properties, you now have the opportunity to rent this tastefully furnished apartment of 172m2
The property, originally built in 1783 as a grain warehouse, is listed and carefully converted into exclusive condominiums with respect for the original expression. Here, historical atmosphere is combined with modern comfort in one of the capitalâ€™s most unique housing settings.
The apartment features high ceilings, exposed beams and beautiful details that testify to the buildingâ€™s maritime past. At the same time, the home offers all modern facilities â€“ from an elevator and district heating to well-proportioned rooms and good natural light.
The Blue Warehouse is located on Toldbodgade, right between Amalienborg Palace and Kastellet, with a view of Copenhagen Harbor and a few steps from Ofelia Plads. This 96 square meter apartment, with 5 balconies, located with the Round Tower around the corner, is located at the third floor (top floor) with elevator in a beautiful yellow mansion from 1733. The apartment has been renovated from A-Z with stylish quality furnishings and bright wooden floors throughout.

It is a really cozy and long apartment, located on the third floor, with sloping walls and 5 balconies, facing the yard. You first enter the entrance hall, which guides you into the apartment's two cozy rooms - both with a small balcony. Next, you come to the heart of the apartment, namely the kitchen, family room and living room in one, and here are the apartment's last 3 balconies. All the appliances are included in the kitchen. The large, beautiful bathroom at the end of the apartment has a separate shower and washing machine and tumble dryer in one.

With both metro and train stations just 400 metres away, getting around the city is super easy.

The neighbourhood has everything you need and more. Thereâ€™s a changing table, a high chair for mealtimes, and weâ€™re happy to lend our bedside crib if needed. I am renting out my 2-room apartment near Amagerbro st. from 01. September 2025 for a one year lease (with a possibility of extension). The apartment will be rented out fully furnished.

- 61m2 with newly built 3m2 balcony on a high living room floor

description:
The lovely studio in Pulse Norrebro where I live will be available as of 12 July (specific date to be determined). The tenancy can begin also later, to be discussed. 


It is a 32 sqm studio fully furnished, located on the top 7th floor of the building, with access to a very spacious common lounge with sofa, table and chairs, and to a spectacular terrace overlooking the city, and accessible only to the residents of the top floor. My neighbors are lovely, quiet and respectful. 


There are common areas for work and two massive common kitchens, fully furnished, which you can use in addition to your own private kitchen. Bike parking inside the property is available. The price in DKK is 10.618, including heating, water, internet and laundry. CPR available!

description:
We will be spending some time abroad and are therefore renting out our beloved home. The apartment is a spacious 94 square meters, boasting two cozy bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and dining area, a proper bathroom and a huge open living space with a south-facing balcony. As there is a park right outside the window, it feels very close to nature while still being central. The modern apartment complex also comes with a shared garden complete with new playground, a BBQ area, boules, and more. An elevator enables easy access whenever needed. This rental is perfect for two adults or a couple or a small family with one child. It is fully furnished incl. all key electrical appliances, fully equipped kitchen etc.

It is located just a short walk away from Frederiksberg Center and Valby. You'll have easy access to supermarkets and take-away options, making your daily life a breeze. It is also just a 15min bus or bike ride to the city center with an "A bus" just outside the door and only a few minutes walking distance from the closest S-train station.

description:
SkÃ¸n lejlighed pÃ¥ 166 kvm med vÃ¦relser i stueplan og fÃ¦lles opholdsrum pÃ¥ 1 salen + 43 kvm tagterrasse, hvor  i kan nyde solen i fred og ro. I befinder jer pÃ¥ KÃ¸benhavns attraktive havnefront - Sluseholmen. OmrÃ¥det har ideel placering, om du arbejder i eller udenfor byen. 

Lejligheden indeholder: Rummelig entrÃ© med trappe til 1 salen, 3 gode vÃ¦relser samt badevÃ¦relse med brus og vaskefaciliteter. 1 salen byder gÃ¦stetoilet, kontor afdeling samt pÃ¥ et  stort kÃ¸kken-alrum ifm. med stuen, Her er en ekstra loftshÃ¸jde (ca. 5 m) og vinduer fra gulv til loft, der giver et fantastisk lysindfald samt en god udsigt over kanalerne og havneindlÃ¸bet.
P-plads med mulighed for Clever ellader i kÃ¦lderen samt bÃ¥dplads kan tillejes.
Tilleje i 3-4 Ã¥r

Her er kort afstand til motorvej & lufthavn, fÃ¥ minutter til S-tog og indre City er blot et lille kvarter vÃ¦k. OmrÃ¥det er kendetegnet ved de mange kanaler, slusen og havnelÃ¸bet der sammen med de mange smÃ¥ bÃ¥dklubber samt havnebadet giver en skÃ¸n maritim stemning. INFO : I 2024 kommet den nye metro M4, som kÃ¸rer direkte til Orientkat i Nordhavn (CIS), hvor det nÃ¦rmeste stop er blot 5 min. pÃ¥ gÃ¥ben fra lejligheden, som gÃ¸r det endnu lettere at komme ind til centrum.

2-storey townhouse apartment with large private roof terrace for rent for 3-4 years.
This apartment offers 166 sqm with rooms on the ground floor and living space on the first floor + 43 sqm roof terrace where you can enjoy the sun in peace and quiet. You are located on Copenhagen's attractive harbour front - Sluseholmen. The area is ideally located whether you work in or outside the city. 
The apartment contains: Spacious entrance hall with stairs to the first floor, 3 good bedrooms and a bathroom with shower and laundry facilities. The 1st floor offers a guest toilet, office area and a large kitchen-dining room in connection with the living room. Here there is an extra ceiling height (approx. 5 m) and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide fantastic light and a good view of the canals and the harbour.
Parking space with the possibility of Clever electric charger in the basement and a boat mooring can be rented.
There is a short distance to the motorway & airport, a few minutes to the S-train and the inner city is just a short block away. The area is characterised by the many canals, the lock and the harbour circuit, which together with the many small boat clubs and the harbour baths create a wonderful maritime atmosphere. INFO : In 2024, the new metro M4 had arrived, running directly to Orientkat in Nordhavn (CIS), with the nearest stop just a 5-minute walk from the apartment. on foot from the apartment, making it even easier to get into the city centre.

The apartment has a unique location, 200 meters from Husum Station, and also walking distance to two of the best parks in Copenhagen area, Utterslev Mose and Kagsmose.

In the area you can find several restaurants and cafÃ©s. The center of the city is 23 minutes away by S-train, which runs every 10 minutes during weekdays.

title: Furnished Studio in Lyngby, Greater Copenhagen
description:
Hi,
My name is Nermin, and I am a scientist. I am leaving town for six months from July to December 2025 for a research fellowship. I am subleasing my studio to an adult student, PhD, or postdoc fellow in Lyngby, Greater Copenhagen. The Studio has everything you need daily. It's for one person and a couple of minutes' walk from Sorgenfri Station. The place is so close to DTU that you can cycle or walk to your school. Please note that this studio is eligible for the Student Grant and Housing Subsidy.

Rent: 7700 
utilities: 1000 DKK (all inclusive internet, electricity, water, and heating).
Three-month deposit
Period: July to December.
You can register CPR.

Please note that the building company settles the monthly utility payment (1000 DKK) each year. I usually get some money back, so you should expect some of this amount back by April 2026 (when I get cash back from the company).

I will leave the key with a friend, so if you can not show up on July 1st, you can pick it up later from him.
I am also flexible, so if you have exams and want some flexibility, I can consider leaving or extending your stay into January 2026. 

In the Studio, you will have your bathroom and kitchenette with a fridge and stove, as well as plenty of space and storage. You can also access a huge communal kitchen with extra storage space, stoves, ovens, and freezers. 

There is access to diverse facilities, including 24/7 laundry facilities with payment.

There are also free facilities, including: 
- 24/7 gym
- Rooftop with a fantastic landscape and overlook stations
- Extra study rooms and areas
- Cinemas
- Superfast Wi Fi
- Social and sports events
- 24/7 Security and a campus body to contact in any emergency, even late nights or early mornings. 
- Large roof terrace with gardens and terraces to enjoy
- parties and lots of other fun activities 
- Free maintenance for common issues (e.g., drainage system blockage, changing light bulbs, etc.) 

Best,
Nermin

Now available for rent. An elegant and well-designed 2-room apartment of 66 mÂ², located on the 2nd floor of the award-winning development designed by Vilhelm Lauritzen Architects. Completed in the autumn of 2023, the building draws inspiration from Denmarkâ€™s chalk cliffs at Stevns Klint â€“ a modern and natural addition to the surroundings.

The apartment is easily accessible by both elevator and stairs and is situated in peaceful surroundings. Inside, no detail has been overlooked â€“ from the beautiful oak flooring to the high-quality kitchen and top-of-the-line appliances.

You enter through a spacious hallway with plenty of storage and a large built-in wardrobe. From here, there's access to the bathroom, equipped with a wall-hung toilet, rain shower, and a laundry column with both washing machine and dryer.

The kitchen is custom-made by Kustomhouse, featuring exquisite joinery and includes all major appliances: refrigerator, freezer, dishwasher, oven, and stove. All kitchenware is included.

The living room is the heart of the home â€“ bright and welcoming with four large windows and thoughtfully arranged with zones for working, dining, and relaxing. From the living room, there is access to the spacious brick balcony through two separate doors. Here, you can enjoy the morning sun and peaceful evenings with direct views of the canal and the gentle sound of the water.

The bedroom features a large continental bed (180x210 cm) and a generous floor-to-ceiling wardrobe. Blackout blinds with cassettes and side rails ensure light reduction for a restful night's sleep. The window offers a calming view of the canal that surrounds the building. A private basement storage room is also included with the apartment.

KronlÃ¸bsÃ¸en offers a unique, car-free courtyard with trees and lush greenery â€“ the perfect place to unwind. Residents have access to the Sauna House just outside the building, and a fully equipped gym will be available free of charge in 2025. The building also includes a four-level underground parking garage and secure bicycle storage.

title: Unique furnished apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
The apartment is available from July 14 for a one-year lease, with possibility of extension.

We are looking for a single person or a couple. It is not suitable for families or sharing, and pets are not allowed.

This three-room corner apartment is located in a rare building in old town Copenhagen with a spectacular view of the historical Nikolaj Church. The apartment has the full corner of the building and is situated on the 3rd floor allowing plenty of light from six windows facing the street and two windows facing the rooftops and Parliament building. The fully equipped kitchen and bathroom are newly renovated. The large and bright living room features an old fireplace, inbuilt shelves, a desk, a solid oak wood table with space for six people, a two-seater sofa, and chairs from &tradition. All furniture and lighting are high-quality contemporary design. The kitchen is equipped with a Dishwasher, oven, washing machine, microwave oven, and the apartment has a lot of inbuilt storage space. The bedroom has a tall double bed and a closet fitting-room style. The middle room is an 18th-century service hall remade as a guest room with a daybed. 

We are a Swedish/Danish couple renting out the Apartment on a long term basis because we are living in New York. You can visit the apartment by contacting us here.

This apartment on Gammel Strand 3. floor in Copenhagen is an impressive 182 mÂ² home that combines historic charm with modern conveniences. title: Bright & fully furnished flat on Islandsbrygge!
description:
Hello future tenant. If you're looking for a modern and cozy flat in the heart of Copenhagen, look no further! This newly renovated apartment has an AMAZING location only a few blocks from the waterfront and Islandsbrygge metro station.

FURNITURE: The flat comes FULLY FURNISHED with a queen-sized bed, 2 SMART TVs, 2 leather couches, a work desk, ample closet space and a dining table. Basic amenities such as dishes, cutlery, lamps, mirrors, chairs, etc. are also included. The apartment has a nice newly constructed balcony and is situated on the 3rd floor. The building has an elevator and a shared wash-room in the basement which is very reasonably priced. 

THE AREA: Islandsbrygge is an extremely safe and popular part of Copenhagen to live in. The apartment is located in the "cozy area" with heaps of local shops, boutiques and grocery stores in the neighborhood. The waterfront - which is a popular spot to enjoy the sun, jump in the water, play sports, bar-BQ on the grass, etc, - is located only a block away from the apartment. Close by is Langebro connecting you to the city center with Tivoli, City hall, Central Train station and the main Shopping street. All of which is only a 5-10 min bike ride away.

AVAILABILITY: The apartment is available for move-in from the 1 of July, 2025.

THE IDEAL TENANT: I'm looking for someone who is clean, honest, has a stable income and will treat the apartment and its neighbors respectfully.Â The flat is NOT suited for friends to share, however, a couple would be fine (this would be subject to an additional 850 kr./month to cover increased expenditures of water, electricity, wear & tear, etc.).

VIEWING: If you are interested in a viewing, please contact me with a bit of info about yourself (including: occupation, nationality, desired move-in date, etc) and I will reach out ASAP. 

Thanks for your interest, I look forward to hearing from you.
- Chresten
address: 11. maj, Bergthorasgade, 2300 KÃ¸benhavn, KÃ¸benhavn S  - 3. sal

- Parkering mulig i kÃ¦lder (Jeudan). Der er opsat el-ladere pÃ¥ alle pladser. OgsÃ¥ adgang for gÃ¦ster.

OMGIVELSERNE
Kort afstand til bÃ¥de daglige indkÃ¸b, restauranter, sport og strand
- Supermarked 1 minut gang til Netto; 5 minutters cykel til LIDL og Meny.
- 1 minut til KinKin ToGo (Thai food), Lagkagehuset, Tio Marios (Italiensk), og Storehouse (Burgers, Fish & steaks)
- Transport: Ã˜sterport st. i gÃ¥afstand, hvor S-tog, Metro og Regionaltog stopper.
- Fitness & Wellness: Ved Ã˜sterport st. findes FitnessWorld. Adinahotellet i samme bygning tilbyder adgang til indendÃ¸rs pool og fitness.
- Strand: Kun 10 minutters cykel til SvanemÃ¸llen Strand og 20 minutters cykeltur til Amager Strandpark (eller tag metro fra Ã˜sterport st.)

NB: Kan lejes tom eller delvist mÃ¸bleret (senge og skabe, evt. med kontormÃ¸bel-pakke)

------------

This apartment is a fantastic match for many wishes!

2 bedrooms, living room and kitchen-dining room.

- Couples with children have direct access from the living room to a wide terrace and enclosed courtyard, where the children can play with the other children while the parents themselves enjoy the sun.
- Singles get a spacious apartment with a separate study room and access to a shared huge rooftop terrace.
- Seniors get a bright and friendly apartment with its own terrace, no door steps, a lift to the parking garage and street level and to the rooftop terrace.
- Expats get a modern home with easy access to transport to the airport, workplaces and embassies.
- 2 or 3 students can share the apartment by agreement. Contact me for further details.

The neighbors know each other and hold, among other things, joint barbecue days in the summer.

THE APARTMENT & FACILITIES
Very well laid out apartment in very good condition.
- 2 bedrooms with good furnishing options and good light from large windows.
- Living room and kitchen/dining room are connected and perfect both for the family and if you have guests visiting.
- Modern bathroom with huge mirror, new toilet and nice shower.
- The building's widest and "best located" terrace with afternoon and evening sun.
- Huge shared rooftop terrace on the 7th floor with a view of the city's rooftops. Easy access via elevator in the entrance.
- Parking possible in the basement (Jeudan). Electric chargers are set up at all places. Also access for guests.

THE SURROUNDINGS
A short distance to both daily shopping, restaurants, sports and the beach!
- Supermarket: 1 minute walk to Netto; 5 minutes by bike to LIDL and Meny.
- Restaurants: 1 minute to KinKin ToGo (Thai food), Lagkagehuset (bakery), Tio Marios (Italian), and Storehouse (Burgers, fish and steaks)
- Transport: Ã˜sterport st. within walking distance, where the S-train, Metro and Regional trains stop. Bus 27 stops outside.
- Fitness & Wellness: Across the street there is PWH and at Ã˜sterport st. found FitnessWorld. The Adina hotel in the same building offers access to an indoor pool and gym.
- Beach: Only a 10-minute bike ride to SvanemÃ¸llen Beach and a 20-minute bike ride to Amager Strandpark (or take the metro from Ã˜sterport st.)

NB: Can be rented empty or partially furnished (beds and wardrobes, possibly with office furniture package)

description:
Large living room in open connection with nice bright kitchen with quality appliances from Siemens. From the living room and the kitchen there is access to the two large sunny balconies. The living room has an unobstructed view of the beautiful green courtyard. Furthermore, the apartment offers two very nice bedrooms, both bright with built-in wardrobes, as well as a nice bathroom with Zanussi washing machine and tumble dryer. The apartment has a nice oak plank floor.

The apartment is centrally located on Islands Brygge, one of the capital's most attractive districts with delicious delicatessen and specialty shops, cafes and eateries. From Weidekampsgade it is walking distance to the Inner City and Christianshavn, and the nearest metro is a few hundred meters away. With Amager FÃ¦lled and the harbour bath, you even have urban nature and Copenhagen's unique harbor environment very close.

A canal marks the transition between the modern residential buildings and Bryggen's red warehouses, which creates the exciting contrast between new and old that characterizes the local area.

Rental of parking space in the building's closed parking garage is possible.

title: Renovatated furnised apartment in Gentofte/Vangede for 1-3 month with possibility for extension
description:
Dear Renter

I have my 59 m2 apartment in Vangede/Gentofte, furnished as you see in picture. Right now it is furnished for 2 persons with a sleeping- and and living room, nice kitchen and bathroom. It will ready and furnished from 01.07.2025 as current renter wants to go back to their country after trying living in DK and job situation was not good. It is not for family with kids, better for single or couples.

The apartment will be rented out 1 month at a time with the possibility of extension. The apartment is undersold and you must be open to working with the real estate agent and keeping it neat for viewing.

Rent is 13.000 dkr. plus heat/water every month (Electricity, you will be connect yourself so it will be direct). Deposit is 13.000 dkr. and if you of course treat the apartment nice you will get all money back (I have references here from earlier renters). Price is including Internet and please note there is no TV, but you are welcome bring one.

Hope you like the design of funishing and check out the area. There are busses close and 25 minutes to center of Cph.

*washing machine and drying tumbler in basement.

Kristian K.

English:
Large, lovely 3-room residence with 2 spacious rooms, a living room connected to an open kitchen, a beautiful bathroom, and a large, south-facing balcony with a fantastic view.

The apartment is located on the 3rd floor at the corner/gable of a modern property centrally on Islands Brygge. It is well distanced from all neighbors and has a lovely view of a green wedge, plenty of sky, and the water of Copenhagen's canals while being set back enough that the lively atmosphere of Brygge does not disturb.

Upon entering the apartment, you step into a spacious hallway with room for outerwear. From there, you have access to a large living area that serves as both a dining and living room. The kitchen is in open connection with the living area and is equipped with a large kitchen island and all necessary appliances. From the living area, there is direct access to a large, covered balcony with furniture and a view of a green area and water. The apartment has two bedrooms; one with built-in closets and both furnished with a bed or sofa bed. The bathroom is large and spacious, tiled with two separate sinks, cabinet space, and a separate shower niche and washing facilities.

The apartment is located minutes from Islands Brygge Metro Station, Dybbelsbro S-train Station, Fisketorvet Shopping Center, and Copenhagen Central Station. There is also easy access to Islands Brygge harbor and swimming area, restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, gyms, and fitness centers all within walking distance, and easy access to the historical Christianshavn and the inner city via Copenhagen's bicycle bridges. A very short distance away lies Amager FÃ¦lled, which offers beautiful nature and rich wildlife, ideal for picnics, walks, and runs away from the noise and bustle of city life. With Amager FÃ¦lled's extensive trail system, there is a short distance to, among other places, DR-Byen and the University of Copenhagen.

The property features an open green courtyard with a playground. There is an elevator in the building. The area around the apartment has ample parking opportunities. The apartment is rented out furnished with various kitchen utensils, tableware, etc., and is ready to move into. Internet is included in the rent, while water and heating are paid on account. Other utility expenses such as electricity are not included in the rent. Contact for a viewing today.

Amazing penthouse corner apartment with private rooftop terrace

Get an exclusive base in the middle of the city with green surroundings right outside your door. This exclusive corner apartment offers a very special atmosphere, where light and air is in focus. The home is enriched with a multitude of windows that ensure natural light all day long and a fantastic view.

From here, a staircase leads to the apartment's private roof terrace - a rare luxury in the middle of the city, where you can enjoy the sun, peace and views over the rooftops of Copenhagen.
The apartment also has a beautiful bedroom with several windows, which creates a comfortable and relaxed atmosphere. In addition, there are two smaller rooms - ideal as a children's room, office or guest room - and a functional bathroom.

title: FULLY FURNISHED 3 BEDROOM APARTMENT FOR RENT FOR 1 YEAR FROM JULY 2025
description:
The apartment is located in the best location in Copenhagen right by Enghave Plads in Vesterbro. 

It is ideal for a couple and includes a bedroom, dining room, living room, kitchen and bath. The apartment is 86 m2. 

The apartment will be available from 1 July 2025 (earlier takeover can be arranged) and for a period of 12 months with the possibility to extend with 1-2 months. 

It is located in the loveliest area of Copenhagen surrounded by cafes and green areas with easy access to the city center. 

The rent + all utilities is DKK 19.800 a month. A deposit of DKK 51.000 is required beforehand.

title: Inner city of CPH availabilityâ€™s from 9th June
description:
MOVE IN DATE 9th JUNE 2025.

Looking for a home in the inner city - then look no further!

The apartment is close to Town Hall Square, StrÃ¸get, which means that all necessities are within walking distance.

The apartment itself is located on Vestergade on the 2nd floor. Vestergade is known as one of Copenhagen's liveliest streets.

The apartment consists of two rooms of 21 sqm, a smaller room 15 sqm, a kitchen of about 8 sqm and a bathroom 5 sqm, which totals to 64 sqm. The kitchen is equipped with the necessary utensils that a modern kitchen contains. The bathroom is a small classical Copenhagen bathroom, fitted with a shower and a wall-mounted toilet.

As can be seen in the pictures, the apartment is partially furnished. The apartment will include furniture such as: bed, bedside table, dining table & folding chairs, sofa, TV table, clothes rack, ceiling lamps, curtains, fridge, oven and hob. 

Prices are as follows: Entire apartment of 64 sqm: DKK 14,500 + DKK 700. The price of water has been determined to DKK 700, however, in case of overuse extra charges could occur. Electricity is based on your monthly usage. Wifi is available at extra charge.

Note: It should be pointed out that the apartment does not include all objects which can be seen in the pictures.

When contacting, please inform us with the following text: 

Name of tenants, age, expected move-in and move-out date. Also write a little about yourself and what you do on a daily basis.

title: Super nice 2-room apartment in Frederiksberg C -Expats only
description:
The apartment is located at a highly sought after address in Frederiksberg. The apartment can be rented for 1-2 years. No Pets!
The apartment is on the 4th floor. There is access to the apartment via a closed gate and the beautiful courtyard environment. There is an elevator!
The apartment is a large 2 bedroom apartment of 86 m2 and offers a distribution entrance with built-in closets and space for outerwear. From the hallway there is a newer, nice bathroom. The bathroom is in a good size with underfloor heating, shower, built-in IFÃ– hanging toilet and with washer and dryer.
The apartment has a state-of-the-art kitchen living room with the most delicious appliances as well as Quooker Fusion and wine refrigerator.
The apartment has a nice large living room, where there is plenty of space for both dining area and sofa area. From the living room there is access to the balcony with plenty of space to sit and enjoy the afternoon and evening sun.
Furthermore, there is a large bedroom with fitted wardrobes.
There are two balconies â€“ one to the northeast at the entrance to the apartment and one to the southwest.
Aconto consumption:
Heating: 560 DKK pr. month
Water: 260 DKK per. month
Internet: 250 DKK pr. month
Broadband is installed via wireless modem from Yousee. The subscription can be taken over.
The apartment is NOT for sharing!! When contacting, please note your phone number !!

The area: Holger Danskes Vej is located centrally in Frederiksberg, close to all the good shopping opportunities, the atmospheric cafe life and the many coffee bars on Falkoner Alle and GodthÃ¥bsvej as well as walking distance to means of transport such as bus and Aksel MÃ¸llers Have Metro. In addition, close distance to Frederiksberg Center and the cozy Agricultural University Garden â€“ a small oasis in the busy city life. Here you will live in a quiet, green and at the same time central area with a short walking distance to virtually all daily necessities. Holger Danskeâ€™s road itself is a quiet road, planted with trees and good parking opportunities. The road is quietly located with one-way traffic.
You can cycle to the metro in five minutes and to the center of Copenhagen in ten minutes. BUS 2A runs towards RÃ¥dhuspladsen, and there is a five-minute walk to the bus stop.

description:
EN: Turn-key fully furnished flat with everything needed including fully equipped kitchen (Bulthaup with Gaggenau and Samsung appliances + coffee machine, microoven, toaster, kettle, etc.), all bedding/linnen and towels (all organic cotton). All textiles, including curtains in the apartment are Eco-certified ie no harmful/toxic substances.
The bathroom is by Philippe Starck for Duravit and comes with both washer and dryer. 
In addition there is drying rack, vacuum cleaner, iron, ironing board, hair dryer, cutlery, kitchen utensils,  and so forth.
There is a Samsung Smart TV (55'') in the living room. 
Wifi is included in the price.
Location is great with view from the 2 balconies towards green area on a quiet cul-de-sac. 5 minute walk to the Metro station, train station and to Fields shopping mall.
Close to 4 supermarkets, local restaurants and bakeries.

Parking is possible in the nearby parking houses for a monthly discounted fee or free street parking approx 5-10 min walk from flat.

No pets allowed.

Some flexibility on move-in date and length of contract.

description:

title: Central modern apartment with own rooftop terrace
description:
Available from June 1, 2025. 

A modern, stylish apartment located at the Harbour side, in central Copenhagen.

Perfect for the small family relocating or expats moving to Copenhagen for a limited time. There is a possibility for extension. 

/The apartment 
It is a two-bedroom apartment with three terraces, including a private rooftop terrace (approx. 60 m2) and the possibility to access two shared rooftop terraces. 

The apartment comes fully furnished with all needed kitchen wear and appliances, and further incl. dishwasher, washing machine, dryer etc. 

The building has elevator included, and it is possible to rent parking in the connected parking garage. 

/The neighbourhood
It is in a quiet neighbourhood within walking distance to "The Little Mermaid", Kastellet, and Kongens Nytorv. â€‹â€‹â€‹There is a opportunity for grocery shopping within 20 meters. 
â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹
Furthermore, the area has several great restaurants, varying from Michelin restaurants to a local cosy pizzeria.

title: Bright top floor apartment at Vesterbro, Enghave Plads
description:
This fully furnished apartment is the perfect home for a couple looking for comfort and style in the heart of Copenhagen. Located on the top floor of a quiet side street, the apartment is bathed in natural light from morning to evening, with large windows and two balconies on opposite sides of the building.

The layout includes two spacious living rooms, offering plenty of space to relax, work, or entertain. Recently renovated, the apartment blends modern touches with cozy charm, making it both functional and inviting. The building has a friendly community, and the neighbors are great.

Vesterbro is packed with fantastic restaurants, bakeries, cafÃ©s, and barsâ€”perfect for food lovers and city explorers. Enghave Plads Metro is just a 2-minute walk away, making it easy to get around, while the Meatpacking District, Carlsberg City, and Frederiksberg Gardens are all within a 10-minute stroll.

While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.

title: A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn
description:
A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn - one of the most charming neighborhoods in Copenhagen, 450 metres from the Royal Opera, a three minutes wail from shopping and fitness and six minutes by bike to Kongens Nytorv.

From the entrance with space to hang outerwear you have access to all of the rooms. There is a combined dining and living room with access to the balcony facing the nice neighborhood. The nice and white kitchen is open to the dining area.

The three rooms can be used as bedrooms, study or guest room.

The bathroom has a shower and is equipped with a washer and a dryer.

In the basement you have a parking place and a storage room.

Available for 3 years from June 1st. for an expat or expat family

title: Modern Frederiksberg Studio with kitchen, loft & private terrace
description:
Welcome to Frederiksberg, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom, kitchen loft and terrace, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. Located centrally in the heart of the Frederiksberg hip and classy neighborhood, with plenty of opportunities for a modern, active life. The lively Rantzausgade and VÃ¦rnedamsvej are both just around the corner - and did we mention it's only 10 min walk from the Lakes? Forum & Nuuks Plads Metro st. are both very close by, and RÃ¥dhuspladsen /City Hall is only a 5 minute away metro-ride. 

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligstÃ¸tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 


The studio is equipped with: 

â€£ Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.  
â€£ Kitchen with oven, fridge, freezer & stove, cabinets with a sink and extractor hood. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances  
â€£ Loft with bed 
â€£ Terrace (6 sqm) 
â€£ Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm) + 2 stools.
â€£ 3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror 
â€£ Bed, including a mattress and a mattress topper (140 cm x 200 cm) 
â€£ Wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, ceiling lamp, blackout curtain and hooks for outerwear. 

Free access to community amenities: 
â€£ Access to common areas including a lobby, reading room, meeting rooms 
â€£ Free access to the fully equipped fitness (in-house) 
â€£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
â€£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.)  

About the building complex: 
â€£ Located in UMEUS Frederiksberg, on BÃ¼lowsvej 
â€£ Proximity to Forum Metro (700 meters away) - 5 min to Copenhagen City Centre 
â€£ Frederiksberg Centre 1 km away from your doorstep 
â€£ Restaurants, parks, cafÃ©s and plenty of shopping around 

Community Life: 
â€£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
â€£ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life â€“ here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, train in the fully-equipped gym or just chill on the rooftop with views over Copenhagen. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ğŸ¤ğŸ  Reach out to arrange a viewing!

title: Studio for 1 person - Modern Housing in Copenhagen Nordhavn
description:
This spacious modern studio for 1 person, is located right by the water in Nordhavn. When staying at us, you will get access to all the facilities that you will need. 

Whatâ€™s inside? 

Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.  

Kitchenette; Cabinets with a sink, extractor hood, oven, stove and refrigerator. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances  

Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm) 

3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror 

Bed with 2 pull-out drawers, including a mattress and a mattress topper (120 cm x 200 cm) 

The studio further comes with wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, a hook for a ceiling lamp of your own, roller blinds and hooks for outerwear. 

On top of that, you will get access to:â€¯â€¯ 
- Fitness: fully equipped gym included in the rent 
- Rooftop terraceâ€¯ 
- Laundry roomâ€¯(paid over rent)â€¯ 
- Group rooms you can bookâ€¯through our app 
- Study hallâ€¯â€¯ 
- Nordhavn Metro is close by  
- Community Manager on site to help with all questions 
- Events â€“ you can take part in our social events and the running club and creative club.

About: 

The dorm offers co-living in Copenhagen. Located centrally in the district of Nordhavn with plenty of opportunities to enjoy an active life.
Just around the corner you will find cafÃ©s, restaurants and supermarkets. Or go and visit the cinema or the rooftop gym across the street. 

The heart of the dorm is the community: the majority of the residents live across 14 communal kitchens. The communal kitchens are designed to create the best framework for communities. Whether you want to cook together or have a movie night, grab a beer or play board games together - this is where it happens.

title: 2 vÃ¦r. lejlighjed pÃ¥ 98 kvm.
description:
This beautifully designed apartment is available for rent either partially furnished or unfurnished, depending on your preference. The lease period is for 12 months with the potential for a lease extension.

Located in the preserved Mineral Water Factory building from the 1920s, the apartment is part of Carlsberg City's transformation into a vibrant residential area. The renovation process adhered to strict architectural standards, leading to the selection of Dorte Mandrup Architects to design the 20 new apartments.

At the top of the building, you'll be welcomed by a charming, landscaped atrium courtyard, where your private terrace is situated right in front of the apartment. Stepping inside, you'll find polished concrete floors and a joiner kitchen, featuring a kitchen island and solid Miele appliances. Next to the kitchen is a spacious and bathroom, complete with toilet, shower, and a combined washer and dryer unit.

The open-plan living area is perfect for both dining and relaxation, with access to the buildingâ€™s shared polishing platform. On the upper mezzanine level, you will be greeted by solid oak plank flooring, high ceilings, and a bright, airy atmosphere â€” ideal for a bedroom or home office.

The home features underfloor heating throughout the whole flat, and also the possibility to rent a parking space in the basement with EV charging. This flat combines the charm of a historic building with granite plinth and the like, while also offering the convenience of a modern one.

title: Apartment in central and hip NÃ¸rrebro with balcony
description:
Looking for short term renters from 20th of march ( one or two months, while I am out traveling myself.
 


Welcome to this completely newly renovated Copenhagen apartment, located in the heart of vibrant NÃ¸rrebro. This spacious, modern home has been carefully renovated to combine contemporary comfort with the charm of a classic Copenhagen apartment, featuring high ceilings and timeless details. The brand new kitchen is equipped with the latest high-end appliances, including a dishwasher, washing machine, and more. The large living area offers a comfortable sofa, perfect for relaxing, as well as plenty of space to eat, work, or unwind.

With a dedicated area for working and a peaceful, quiet environment, this apartment is perfect for longer stays, especially for those who need to work during their visit. Youâ€™ll find everything you need to settle in and be productive while enjoying the comfort of your temporary home.

Enjoy a huge balcony where you can take in peaceful Copenhagen mornings, afternoons, and vibrant Copenhagen nights, all while sipping a glass of wine, enjoying a cup of coffee, or reading a book.

The apartment also boasts a newly renovated bathroom with a separate shower room, a rare feature in traditional Copenhagen apartments.

With one of the best locations in the city, you're just steps away from Rantzausgade, in the heart of NÃ¸rrebro. This area is known for its trendy cafes, restaurants, natural wine bars, and craft beer spots. Just a few places to mention: KÃ¸lsters Tolv Haner, Baka de Busk, and Coffee Collective. You can also enjoy peaceful walks in the nearby Assistens Cemetery, a beautiful spot year-round. The apartment is tucked away on a side street off Rantzausgade, ensuring you wonâ€™t be disturbed by any noise during your stay. Plus, with SÃ¸erne, Frederiksberg, and Vesterbro just a short walk away, youâ€™ll be right in the middle of it all. You can even complete the "Copenhagen experience" by borrowing a bike just around the corner!

I love helping my guests have the best experience, so feel free to ask me anything! I'm a passionate traveler myself, and the only thing I ask is that you take good care of this beautiful apartment while enjoying your stay!

title: Fully Furnished Hotel Apartment
description:
Fully furnished exclusive apartment with plenty space and catering for four persons.  

Easy and ready to move in with fully functional kitchen dishwater, washing machine, dryer and all the utilities and kitchen equipment you need for a long-term stay.

It comes with elevated king size bed in master bedroom, two single beds that can be turned into a double king size, plenty of storage and closet space, large Livingroom sofa and dining area for 6 persons.

You find everything you need from bed linen, towels, TV, high speed Internet, etc.

The location is in an exclusive, cozy, and super convenient neighborhood with all the groceries stores, bakery, restaurants, cafes, salons, etc.

There is free parking all around the building, train station is 6 min walk, bus 1 min walk that can take you into central Copenhagen within 20 minutes.

Within 5 K you have beaches, harbor, beautiful parks, shopping center with cafes, restaurants, and a very nice cinema.

You are welcome to see the apartment and meet with the current tenants.

High speed wifi and TV package is included in rent.

If you want to live centrally in Carlsberg Byen, CPH, with a fantastic view and tranquility from the 25th floor, this apartment could be perfect for you. Located in HÃ¸ffdings Tower, this exclusive 2-room apartment spans 62 mÂ², plus a 2 mÂ² balcony. The apartment faces east/south, providing perfect conditions to enjoy sunrises over Ã˜resund and views of central Copenhagen. It maintains a comfortable temperature in the afternoon and evening, with the view preserved without sun-blocking curtains.

The apartment has an optimal layout, utilizing every square meter. The entrance leads to an open kitchen from HTH with a minimalist design, white countertop, and Miele appliances. From the kitchen, you enter the living room, which is set back from the entrance. The living room leads to the bedroom with access to a French balcony with folding doors.

The bathroom features drawer modules, a laundry column (washing machine and dryer from Miele), and an artificial marble sink from Marmorline. The fixtures are from Grohe, and the appliances are from Miele.

The apartment is designed in a minimalist Nordic style with white-pigmented lacquered oak floors and underfloor heating. Under the building, there is a parking basement with the option to rent a parking space, as well as storage rooms, a bicycle basement, and a courtyard.

With extensive parks, multiple and diverse dining options, grocery shopping, gym and much more, itâ€™s designed for an active and convenient place to live in Copenhagen.

title: Exceptionally well located apartment in the first row to Copenhagen's harbor!
description:
Welcome to Herluf Trolles Gade!

For dansk tekst; se sidst i annoncen.

Here you will find an apartment in a class of its own, measuring 159 square meters, and is located in the first row to Copenhagen's harbor in what can be described as one of Copenhagen's most central and best locations. This provides an astonishing amenity value.

The apartment has been modernized, and has a stately feel.

You enter a large entrance hall where there are two smaller storage rooms for storing outerwear or anything else that needs to be put away.

From the entrance you can access a large bathroom with separate shower. In addition, from the entrance there is access to a very extraordinary utility room, which contains closet space, sink and washer and dryer.

In the second part of the apartment, there is a large kitchen, located in an orval room, where there is plenty of space to place a large dining table. Next, the apartment has two large living rooms, one of which can optimally be used as a sofa room, and the other as a dining room. Both rooms are located with a view of the wonderful Copenhagen harbor, and have a fantastic light.

Finally, the apartment has two large bedrooms, where there is plenty of space to have a bed, closets, desk, etc. One bedroom is located overlooking Copenhagen's harbor.

This is a fantastic apartment, which is some of the absolute best Copenhagen has to offer.

_______________________________________

The apartment is 119 m2 and 4 rooms are easily and functionally disposed, with a modern and attractive touch. There is high ceilings in all rooms, ash parked on the floors and underfloor heating throughout. From the entrance you go through one glass door into it approx. 45 m2 large living room, which is elegantly open in open contact with it modern kitchen made with Hanstholm elements and mahogany countertops. The living room that is The natural focal point of the apartment is connected to the large southwest facing balcony of about 10 m2 , the bedroom with fitted wardrobes and one of the 2 children\'s rooms. title: Spacious 4 rooms new 128 m2 apartment
description:
The apartment is on the 11th floor with a south-west facing living room and a spacious balcony - it gives a beautiful view directly over the city and parks!

You enter a beautiful and spacious entrance hall, which gives access to your large living room with an open kitchen. 
The entrance also gives access to a guest toilet/bathroom and a spacious bedroom that could be a guest bedroom or bed room for grown up kids. 
The master bedroom comes with a walk-in closet and attached toilet/bathroom and washing machine & dryer.
In addition, there is a small room besides master bedroom, which could be used as a child room or study/work room or simply as an extension of the living room. 

The area is surrounded by beautiful parks and gardens for a walk, jog, or a family picnic - JC Jacobsens Have, Enghave Parken, SÃ¸ndermarken, and Frederiksberg Have.

For families with children, there are many good children institutions right in the backyard and the famous European School Copenhagen is at a walkable distance. There are lots of wonderful playgrounds, free time activity centers for children, sports/fitness centers nearby. Copenhagen Zoo is like 15-20 minutes walk from the apartment - yes, we could go on.

There are 3 big supermarkets within 2 minutes walk. Resturants, rooftop bars, cafes, bakeries, spa, shops are all located within 5 minutes walk. 

The apartment location is super convenient, you can easily take S-Train (Carlsberg Byen Station), Buses, and Metro-train (Enghave Plads Metro). Within 5 minutes you can reach Central Train station and Tivoli. 

The apartment comes with a big storage room in the basement. 
There is paid Car parking available very conveniently under the apartment tower. 

The apartment is rented out for a maximum of 24 months (with a possibility to renew), but less duration can also be agreed.

his exclusive 129m2 apartment is located on the 1st floor of Kjeldahl House, which is located in an attractive location in Carlsberg Byen.  Carslebrg Byen offers a broad variate of cafes, restaurants, shopping possibilities and and in walking distance to the S-train and metro. 

The building was build in 2021, is accessible through an elevator and is the ideal apartment for a family looking for comfort and space. The floor plan has a large living space with an open kitchen + 4 additional (bed)rooms, 2 modern bathrooms, a balcony and a unique small terrace overlooking a small, shared grass area.
The apartment gets a lot of light, has exclusive herringbone floors and the kitchen is equipped with high end equipment from Miele and a Quooker. 

The apartment is unfurnished. Initial rental period is up to 2 years, with possibility to extend.

Pets and smoking is NOT allowed.

title: 3 vÃ¦relses lejlighed pÃ¥ Islands Brygge i KÃ¸benhavn S udlejes
description:
Gemini er latin og betyder tvillinger, og det giver jo meget god mening, nÃ¥r man ser pÃ¥ den gamle frÃ¸silo pÃ¥ Islands Brygge. Gemini Residence, kaldes siloen i dag, som nok er mere siamesiske tvillinger end bare tvillinger, for siloerne i den gamle sojakagefabrik fletter sig ind i hinanden i et arkitektonisk mestervÃ¦rk. 84 lejligheder er her, alle bygget uden pÃ¥ siloerne, og de kunne ikke ligge bedre i deres eget 8-tal lige ved Bryggebroen og lige over for Fisketorvet.Â Â 
Alle 143 m2 er vendt mod vandet. Det samme er terrassen, der er lang som lejligheden og har sol fra morgen til aften. Gemini Residence stod fÃ¦rdig i 2005. Det indvendige af 8-tallet er en tom skal med foyer, trapper og elevator, og det hele ligger under et gennemsigtigt tag. Det er nytÃ¦nkning, der vil noget. Kvarteret med den gamle sojakagefabrik er omdÃ¸bt til Havnestad, hvor en del af de gamle bygninger enten er restaureret eller ombygget. Gemini Residence, Pressesiloen, Zeppelinerhallen og Wennbergsiloen er nogle af dem. 
De er alle bÃ¸rn af et slidt, industrielt omrÃ¥de, men Islands Brygge har de sidste snart 25 Ã¥r udviklet sig til det mest hippe og eftertragtede kvarter. Fra at vende ryggen til vandet, vender det i dag krop og ansigt mod KÃ¸benhavn pÃ¥ den anden side af vandet. Kreativ byplanlÃ¦gning med havnebad og promenadeliv gÃ¸r, at Bryggen og Havnestad i dag stÃ¥r som et raffineret miks af moderne byliv med nÃ¦rmiljÃ¸, cafÃ©er og lÃ¦kre butikker. Byens bedste kulturtilbud er lige pÃ¥ den anden side af vandet. Bryggen har rammerne, som med broer og havnebus forbinder det bedste af alt. 
Ledige P-pladser er der ikke mange af pÃ¥ Bryggen, men som lejer fÃ¸lger der en parkeringsplads med. Den ligger under ejendommen med elevator op til lejligheden. Det er ikke biler, der dominerer Bryggen, det er cykler og ladcykler derimod, pÃ¥ cykelstier med indkÃ¸bsposer, bÃ¸rn og kÃ¦rester som uskyldsrene passagerer pÃ¥ ladet.
â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”
Gemini is Latin and means twins, and it makes a lot of sense when you look at the old seed silo at Islands Brygge. Gemini Residence, as the silo is called today, is probably more Siamese twins than just twins, because the silos in the old soy cake factory intertwine in an architectural masterpiece. There are 84 apartments here, all built on the outside of the silos, and they couldnâ€™t be better located right by Bryggebroen and right across from Fisketorvet.
All 143 m2 face the water. So does the terrace, which is as long as the apartment and has sun from morning to evening. Gemini Residence was completed in 2005. The inside of the silos is an empty shell with a foyer, stairs and elevator, and itâ€™s all under a transparent roof. Itâ€™s innovation that matters. The neighborhood with the old soy cake factory has been renamed Havnestad, where some of the old buildings have either been restored or rebuilt. 
in the last 25 years Islands Brygge has developed into the hippest and most sought-after neighborhood. From turning its back on the water, it now faces Copenhagen on the other side of the water. Creative urban planning with a harbor bath and promenade means that Bryggen and Havnestad today stand as a refined mix of modern city life with local environment, cafes and delicious shops. The cityâ€™s best cultural offerings are just on the other side of the water. Bryggen has the framework that, with bridges and the harbor bus, connects the best of everything.
There are not many vacant parking spaces at Bryggen, but as a tenant, a parking space is included. It is located under the property with an elevator up to the apartment.

Parkering â€“ Ja 
Husdyr â€“ Nej
Elevator â€“ Ja

title: Spacious Furnished Studio 400m from Nordhavn Metro (Studio XL w. Kitchen)
description:
ğŸ  Welcome to Nordhavn, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom & kitchen, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. Located centrally in the district of Nordhavn with plenty of opportunities for a modern, active life - you can swim in the harbor baths nearby, go to a cafÃ© or visit the BigBio Cinema just around the corner. Situated in the vibrant Nordhavn neighborhood, this area boasts an array of shops and cafes, with the convenience of a Rema supermarket just a short 300-meter stroll away. RÃ¥dhuspladsen /City Hall is only a 10 minute away metro-ride. 

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligstÃ¸tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 

The studio is equipped with: 
â—† one bed with 2 pull-out drawers, including a mattress and a mattress topper (120 cm x 200 cm) 
â—† desk (60 cm x 100 cm) 
â—† storage cabinet 
â—† wall-mounted shelving 
â—† ceiling lamp 
â—† roller blinds 
â—† wardrobe with a mirror inside 
â—† fully equipped kitchen (oven, fridge & a small freezer compartment and kitchen cupboard with an extractor fan) 
â—† private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.    


Free access to shared areas in the building complex: 
â—† access to common lobby, reading room, bookable meeting rooms 
â—† free access to the fully equipped fitness (in-house) 
â—† roof terrace and courtyard garden 
â—† laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.) 

About the building complex: 
â—† Located in UMEUS Nordhavn, on Helsinkigade 
â—† Proximity to Nordhavn Metro (400 meters away) - 10 min to Copenhagen City Centre 
â—† Rema supermarket 300m away from your doorstep 
â—† 300m away from Sandkaj Harbour bath, where the boardwalk, the cafÃ©s and bathing guests create a lovely beach vibe. 

Live in a place with a wonderful community: 
â—† Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
â—† Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  
The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life â€“ here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, train in the fully-equipped gym or just chill on the rooftop with views over the water. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ğŸ¤ğŸ  Reach out to arrange a viewing! 

*Note: there is only 1 bed in this studio, suitable for couples if 2 tenants occupy it.

title: Penthouse in Copenhagen Vesterbro
description:
One of Copenhagen's most beautiful and unique properties.

A spacious 125 mÂ² apartment with an additional 90 mÂ² private rooftop terrace, offering beautiful views over the city.

2 bedrooms with king-size and queen-size beds.
An extra blow-up double bed is available.

Lounge area

Induction stove

Master bedroom:
Kingsize bed
Training equipment

Double bed
30" smart TV
Mini fridge
Big closet

Waterfall shower
Toilet

Washing machine
Dryer

Lounge area

360 skyline view of all of Copenhagen

Whole apartment:

Located in Downtown Copenhagen area "Vesterbro" one of the most energetic and developing parts of Copenhagen full of local life and with vibrant array of restaurants, cozy cafes, lively bars, and exciting nightclubs. You'll also find plenty of shopping opportunities just steps away.

All of central Copenhagen is within walking distance from the apartment:

Â· 10 minutes to the city central square (RÃ¥dhuspladsen)
Â· 5 minutes to the Copenhagen canals.
Â· 5 minutes to the nearest shopping mall and cinema.
Â· 2 minutes to the nearest metro station.
Â· 5 minutes to Copenhagen Central Station.

Parking spots are available on the street, with charging stations for electric cars and gas stations nearby.



General rules, terms and conditions:


Â· Any form of subleasing is not allowed.

Â· The apartment is used as it is, ie. as it appears and is used by the owner.  It is not allowed to drill holes, paint or to do any other type of customization to the property.

Â· It is not allowed to hold events or any kind of parties in the apartment or anywhere on the property.

Â· The apartment must be treated gently, considerately and carefully.

Â· No smoking inside the apartment.

Â· All entrances must be closed and locked at all times when leaving the apartment.

Â· All damaged and missing things and furniture as well as any kind of damage to the apartment is fully compensated by the tenant.

Â· The apartment must be handed over completely cleaned and tidied when the rental period ends.
Offers a professional cleaning for an additional fee of 800 DKK.

Â· The tenant is required to read, fill and sign a private leasing contract stating the agreement of the rules, terms and conditions, security deposit, rent and rental period.

description:
Unfurnished or partially furnished with a double bed, sofa, dining table and chairs.

No Elevator - 5th floor. 
Note the ceiling height is about 220-240cm.
Rental period 1-2 years. 

This penthouse underwent a thorough renovation in 2017, boasting a west-facing balcony and three spacious (2 bedrooms and one Living room) interconnected rooms with French doors (plus two skylights in the living room). Enjoy panoramic views of Ã˜rsted Park, Copenhagen's towers, and Tivoli Fireworks from the living room, kitchen, and balcony facing west/northwest/north. The bedroom features a large and new sliding door wardrobe.

Partially furnished with a double bed or two single beds! Situated in the heart of the city (Kbh K), close to bars, restaurants, parks, museums, gardens, and adjacent to Torvehallerne Market, Nansensgade, Basket&Skatepark, the lakes, NÃ¸rrebro, Vesterbro, etc. On the fifth floor, you will find a bright and spacious living room, two bedrooms of the same size (or one convertible to a dining room), and a modern kitchen (2017) equipped with a Quooker, teppanyaki-style grill, induction stove, washing machine, and dishwasher.

One bedroom includes a new closet. Some uploaded images may not be updated, so please contact me for additional pictures.

title: Stunning Copenhagen apartment with amazing water view
description:
Available from: 1/11-2024

This is one of the best water views over Copenhagen. This 6th floor apartment offers a generous 93 m2 living space split in two bedrooms, a hallway, an open kitchen and living room and one large bathroom. 

A high quality kitchen with Gaggenau kitchen hardware, Dombracht fixtures in the bath and quality hard wood floors To top it all off you have floor to ceiling windows that brings you to your combined 29 m2 balcony with planted flower beds that are automatically watered by a clever rainwater reuse system. You will find access to the balcony from all living rooms of the apartment. 

The building has been awarded with one of the highest climate certifications, DGNB Gold. 

Surrounding the building you will find plenty of shops, restaurants, play areas and a beach that is one of the hidden treasures of Copenhagen in the summer months. 

We are renting the apartment out 1-2 year with possibility for extension.

Feel free to reach out in case you would like some more information.

E N G E L S K 

Lovely fully furnished apartment in an attractive property on 2 levels of 120 sq m. is for subletting for a shorter period min. 1 month and max. 6 months.

The apartment is available by arrangement.

Do you need an apartment in beautiful surroundings in Gentofte Municipality for a shorter or longer period, min. 1 month and max. 6 months? This is the right apartment, and you only need to bring your personal belongings, as the apartment contains all furnishings, bedding, linen, etc.

There is also free parking and internet at the property.

The monthly rent is DKK 25.000,- plus consumption of water + heating + electricity.

There is free internet and TV signal

The apartment is rented for a period from a minimum of 1 month, and a maximum of 6 months. all by agreement, and will be suitable for Danish/Foreign companies that need housing for employees, as well as insurance companies that need to rehouse a family, or others who need an apartment for a shorter period.

The apartment is located in Gentofte, on an attractive residential street, within walking distance of Gentofte SÃ¸ & Nymosen. The property also has a view of the city and is close to Greater Copenhagen. With S-train to Greater Copenhagen in 17 minutes.

The apartment is on the 2nd floor, and contains a living room, dining room, 2 bedrooms, small kitchen, and large outdoor terrace, fully furnished with rattan furniture, etc.

Large, beautiful bathroom with underfloor heating, washing machine, dryer, etc.

The kitchen has a stove, dishwasher, microwave, coffee maker, fridge/freezer, and all cutlery, etc.

The apartment is fully furnished, and there is also a large flat screen TV, with Netflix, Disney, etc.

In the bedrooms there are 2 large double beds, + cot and high chair 0-2 years.

There is also an extra sofa bed with space for 2 people on the 2nd floor.
Thus, there are sleeping places for a total of up to max. 6 people

In the living room there are 2 leather sofas, sideboard, lamps, coffee table and much more.

In the dining room there is a dining table with 6 chairs, wardrobe etc.

The apartment is located in a beautiful property with half-timbering and high ceilings with an area of â€‹â€‹approx. 120 sq m. on 2 floors.

As mentioned, the apartment is fully furnished and ready to move into.
The only thing you need is your personal belongings.

The apartment can be rented for a short period of min. 1 month and max. 6 months. depending on your needs.

The apartment is on 2 levels, (1st + 2nd floor), and has a great view of Gentofte and the surrounding area.

It is only a few minutes' walk to the S-Train and buses. Several supermarkets in the area as well as several nurseries, kindergartens and several schools.

Distance to Gentofte Hospital, less than 2 km. Lyngby DTU, about 5 km.

Copenhagen is 9 km from Gentofte, and Kastrup Airport 16 km. from the property.
